desc: We are a Medical Supplies company based in Dearborn, Michigan, that specializes in CPAP products & CPAP supplies for Sleep Apnea. We also carry a wide variety of orthotics, walkers, canes, wheelchairs, nebulizers, bath assist & shower assist products, lifts, diabetic shoes, and much more.

layout.text: At Redwood Medical Equipment, we are striving to provide masks and other PPE to patients, hospitals, and even local governments during the current COVID-19 crisis we face together as a community. Our goal is to ensure that anyone, whether its a health care worker or our friends and family, has access to masks and other PPE to protect themselves and to help keep others safe as well.
